attributes.action: Official Paralympic broadcaster to donate all monies made from television and web advertising during live broadcasts of Paralympic events to the IPC
attributes.additional_details:
Channel 4, as official Paralympic broadcaster, has broadcast adverts both on the television and on their live-streaming website which have interrupted live coverage of the London 2012 Paralympic Games.

The signatories on this petition demand that the government do the following:

1)  Insist that Channel 4 publically declare the value of all monies procured from the sale of advertising space during all televised and web-streamed Paralympic events.

2)  Insist that Channel 4 donate in full, the aforementioned monies procured from the sale of advertising space to:

International Paralympic Committee (IPC)
Adenauerallee 212-214, 53113 Bonn, Germany

This should be done so that Paralympians past, present and future can benefit from these funds.

Thank you.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the London Organising Committee of the Olympic and Paralympic Games (LOCOG), who were responsible for the choice of Paralympic broadcaster.
